channel.title: +Essays on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +Essays on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Late sindh
item.description: Excerpt from essay (by shikShA sharma?) in ‘Sindhi Tapestry’ by Saaz Aggarwal Experiences One of my earliest memories is having people of my community, much older than me, touch my feet for my blessings. As an instinctive, knee-jerk response, I always jumped back, surprised each time it happened. Why was this happening to me? TV serials were a large part of my growing-up years, thanks to my mother and grandmother. In them, I saw younger people touching the feet of their elders.
